function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Economic downturn and recession due to covid-19 crisis","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Declining trust in national currency and economic policy","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of vaccination availability","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in implementing new ways of interaction","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate adaptation of services to the new normal","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases through physical interaction in retail spaces.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of personalized experiences leading to customer dissatisfaction and reduced loyalty.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increasing use of face masks and sanitizers may lead to environmental pollution and waste management issues.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Remote services and virtual try-ons may lead to a decrease in in-store foot traffic, impacting physical retailers and the local economy.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of technology for shelf monitoring and clean surfaces may lead to data privacy and cybersecurity risks.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unprecedented transmissibility and variety in symptoms of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic uncertainty and vulnerability to a second wave of infections","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Little prospect of widely available vaccine and second global outbreak","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased use of masks and mask production can contribute to environmental waste and pollution","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid production and adoption of new mask technologies may lead to quality and safety issues","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Promotion of reusable masks may lead to improper maintenance and cleaning, increasing the risk of disease transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long-term effects on consumer psyche from pandemic","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reluctance to engage in consumer research during pandemic","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Littering of masks and gloves in public spaces","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mandatory mask wearing creating high demand","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global supply chain vulnerabilities","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise of counterfeit products","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of coffee yarn and silver nanotechnology in the face mask","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reuse of the mask filter without proper cleaning or replacement","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Antimicrobial face mask becoming a potential source of viral transmission if not handled properly","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential skepticism towards the performance of the eco-friendly face mask","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate decomposition of the coffee face mask after being discarded","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of ineffective protection against air particulate matter","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Collection of used coffee from various sources may introduce contamination and pathogens into the production process.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Importing materials from different locations increases the risk of introducing foreign pathogens and contaminants into the manufacturing process.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High demand and production volume may lead to insufficient monitoring of hygiene and cleanliness in the production process, increasing the risk of contamination and spread of contagious diseases through the shoes.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Haze particles can affect the heart and lungs, especially in people with chronic heart or lung disease.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Worsening air quality leading to high demand for n95 masks.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Environmental pollution from fashion industry contributing to carbon emissions and ocean pollution.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Production and distribution of face masks during a contagious disease outbreak","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Air pollution and its impact on public health","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High percentage of consumers adopting new behaviors and habits due to covid-19.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"New habits and behaviors adopted during covid-19 crisis likely to persist.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of face masks as a result of air quality concerns and the covid-19 pandemic.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of research on green brand equity in the context of covid-19 post-pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Innovative products and marketing strategies in response to covid-19","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on consumer behaviors and attitudes","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Customers underestimating the risk of contagion due to strong brand loyalty and trust","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate risk assessment and management of contagion in brand experience environments","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overemphasis on customer experience and brand image leading to negligence of contagion risk","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in greenwashing leading to consumer skepticism about brand promises to preserve the environment","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mistrust leading to decreased engagement in the long run","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Asymmetry of information in the marketplace","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The text discusses the impact of brand image on consumer attitudes and brand equity, but does not address the risk of contagious diseases propagation","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Contagious spread of misinformation about green brands and environmental benefits leading to consumer deception and confusion.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"}]}
